SEARCH
Package com.example.questplugin.util

Class RarityRoller

java.lang.Object
com.example.questplugin.util.RarityRoller
public class RarityRoller extends Object
The RarityRoller class provides functionality for rolling quest rarities and calculating bonus multipliers based on configuration.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    RarityRoller(QuestPlugin plugin)
    Constructs a RarityRoller instance with the given QuestPlugin.

  • Constructor Details

    • RarityRoller

      public RarityRoller(QuestPlugin plugin)
      Constructs a RarityRoller instance with the given QuestPlugin.
      Parameters:
      plugin - The QuestPlugin instance to use for configuration access.

  • Method Details

    • rollUpgrade

      public QuestRarity rollUpgrade(QuestRarity base)
      Rolls an upgraded quest rarity based on the input base rarity and config-defined upgrade chances. Upgrade chances are defined as follows: - QuestRarity.COMMON: rarity_upgrade_chances.COMMON_TO_RARE - QuestRarity.RARE: rarity_upgrade_chances.RARE_TO_EPIC - QuestRarity.EPIC: rarity_upgrade_chances.EPIC_TO_LEGENDARY
      Parameters:
      base - The starting quest rarity.
      Returns:
      The rolled upgraded quest rarity.

    • getBonusMultiplier

      public double getBonusMultiplier(QuestRarity rarity)
      Retrieves the bonus multiplier for the given quest rarity based on configuration. If no multiplier is found, defaults to 1.0.
      Parameters:
      rarity - The QuestRarity to retrieve the bonus multiplier for.
      Returns:
      The bonus multiplier as a double.
